Package library

Class Librarian

java.lang.Object
library.Librarian
public class Librarian
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a librarian who manages customers and loans in a library.

    • searchBooks

      public java.util.ArrayList<Book> searchBooks​(java.lang.String creator, int yearStart, int yearEnd, Universe universe, java.lang.String searchTitle, int startResearch) throws EmptyResearchException
      Calls the BNF API to search for books according to filters.
      Parameters:
      creator - Searched author (can be empty)
      yearStart - Minimum year of publication (-1 means no filter)
      yearEnd - Maximum year of publication (-1 means no filter)
      universe - Searched document universe (can be empty)
      searchTitle - Text to search in titles (can be empty)
      startResearch - Where to start the API call to manage pages
      Returns:
      List of Book objects corresponding to filters
      Throws:
      EmptyResearchException - if the research results are empty

    • addToDatabaseLoan

      public void addToDatabaseLoan​(Loan loan, int customerId)
      Adds a loan to the database for the given customer.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to add to the database
      customerId - the ID of the customer associated with the loan

    • markBack

      public void markBack​(Loan loan)
      Marks a loan as returned, updates its effective return date, and checks if it is late.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to mark as returned

    • searchBookFromISBN

      public Book searchBookFromISBN​(long isbn) throws BookNotInDataBaseException
      Searches for a book in the BNF catalog using the provided ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN (International Standard Book Number) of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      A Book object representing the book found in the BNF catalog.
      Throws:
      BookNotInDataBaseException - If the book with the provided ISBN is not found in the BNF catalog.

    • searchBookFromISSN

      public Book searchBookFromISSN​(long issn) throws BookNotInDataBaseException
      Searches for a book in the BNF catalog using the provided ISSN.
      Parameters:
      issn - The ISSN (International Standard Serial Number) of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      A Book object representing the book found in the BNF catalog.
      Throws:
      BookNotInDataBaseException - If the book with the provided ISSN is not found in the BNF catalog.

    • searchBookFromIdentifier

      public Book searchBookFromIdentifier​(java.lang.String ark) throws BookNotInDataBaseException
      Searches for a book in the BNF catalog using the provided identifier (ARK).
      Parameters:
      ark - The ARK (Archival Resource Key) identifier of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      A Book object representing the book found in the BNF catalog.
      Throws:
      BookNotInDataBaseException - If the book with the provided identifier is not found in the BNF catalog.

    • isIdentifierOverBorrowed

      public boolean isIdentifierOverBorrowed​(java.lang.String identifier)
      Checks if an identifier has been borrowed more than 10 times without being returned.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the identifier to check
      Returns:
      true if the identifier is overborrowed, false otherwise

    • MostFamousLoan

      public java.util.ArrayList<Book> MostFamousLoan() throws MissingDataFileException
      Finds and returns the most borrowed books in the past 30 days.
      Throws:
      MissingDataFileException - If the data file is missing.
      BookNotInDataBaseException - If a book is not found in the database.
      java.net.URISyntaxException - If there is a URI syntax error.
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • updateCustomer

      public boolean updateCustomer​(int customerId, java.lang.String newFirstName, java.lang.String newLastName, java.lang.String newBirthDate)
      Updates a customer's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to update.
      newFirstName - The new first name of the customer.
      newLastName - The new last name of the customer.
      newBirthDate - The new birth date of the customer.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was updated, false otherwise.

    • printLoans

      public java.lang.String printLoans()
      Generates a formatted string containing details of all loans.
      Returns:
      formatted string with loan details
